author: Laura Meckler
title: House Speaker Paul Ryan Warns Against ‘Identity Politics’
text:
WASHINGTON—House Speaker Paul Ryan blamed Republicans as well as Democrats for practicing politics that try to “exploit divisions between people” and said he had hoped to show an alternative.
In an interview broadcast on Sunday, Mr. Ryan (R., Wis.) said liberal politicians had crafted what he termed “identity politics,” but that conservatives later did the same.
